title: Bluetooth connections are very hard to setuo
content:
I have a lot of difficulty connecting to the Bluetooth on my Pixel 4A (5G) phone. It appears to forget previous successful connections  and to reconnect, I am forced to remove the previous connection, shut down my phone completely and set up a new connection and sometimes this does not work. 
I appear to have a particular problem when connecting to my Fitbit app and the Fitbit sense watch.
I am sure I have tried all the recommended fixes but problem persists. 
Is there a problem wire the PixelA4â€™s Bluetooth?
Thanks in advance.
